item.description:
Come support veteran members, Barbara Jean Crehan of Really Special Animals (http://www.facebook.com/ReallySpecialAnimals) & her pit bull mix, Cain, at the Companion Dog Sports Program Obedience Competition this weekend at Performance Plus Dog Training facility in Taunton, MA!

From CDSP on facebook at http://www.facebook.com/pages/Companion-Dog-Sports-Program/254405371256214:

For more information, you can also check out our website... www.companiondogsportsprogram.com

Mission: Making obedience fun and rewarding for handlers and their companions!

Description: Companion Dog Sports Program (CDSP) is a great obedience venue that allows purebreds, mixed breeds, and even disabled dogs to "strut their stuff". Handlers are allowed to encourage their dogs during exercises, and can use food rewards in between them!

Novice Includes: On Lead Heeling, Off Leash Figure Eight, Moving Stand for Exam, Recall Over Bar Jump, and the Honor Stay. Open Includes: Off Lead Healing, Running broad jump, Drop On Recall, Retrieve on the flat, Retrieve over the high jump, and the Go out, turn and sit. Utility Includes: Signals, Scent Discrimination, Directed Jumping, Driected Retrieve, and the Moving stand for exam.

Date: August 25-26, 2012 (2 Trials Each Day) Location: Taunton, MA Host Club: Performance Plus Dog Training Classes Offered: Novice A, B, C; Open A, B, C; Utility A, B Judges: Sheila Bennett, Barb Burri Contact: Lauren Oâ€™Flaherty 508.821.7587 or lauren@performanceplusk9.com

More event info can be found here: http://www.performanceplusk9.com/
item.name: Come support NEBBC members, Barbara Jean & Cain, pit bull mix at CDSP Trial!
